items.name: JP's Fake Twitter
items.description: This is a fake twitter developed using React and Redux. A  user can add new tweets, view existing tweets, like tweets, reply to tweets, and reply to replies of the tweets. This App helped to solidify understanding of React and Redux

items.name: Would You Rather Game
items.description: A game developed using React, as UI libray, and Redux, as State Management library. A user can signin, add questions, respond to questions asked by others, and compare his performance with others on Leaderboard.

items.name: MyReads
items.description: A book library developed using React that enables people to track the books they are reading, they have read, and the ones they wish to read.

items.name: Buy from Rwanda
items.description: An online platform that helps people to buy products made in Rwanda. It is basically built with HTML and CSS.

items.name: Contacts App
items.description: App developed using ReactJS. This app allows users to keep their contacts in a secure environment

items.name: New Year Countdown
items.description: An app developed using VanillaJS to allow people to count their favorite days. This specificallly allows uses to count down to thier new year parties.

items.name: Feedback Form
items.description: A form designed to be sent to friends to give me feedback on my behaviors. I designed it to show my mastery of forms in HTML

items.name: My Profile
items.description: A description of myself aimed at telling people who Jean Pierre Imanirumva is, a summary of his life, and how he got into coding.

items.name: Sticky Stories
items.description: A sticky story made to ensure that I have mastered HTML, and CSS

items.name: My Google
items.description: A landing page of Google built for the purpose of mastering HTML, and CSS..
